function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on POE studies in the context of management of health club facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of inadequate post-pandemic precautionary measures","Mitigation":"Conducting specific POE studies for health club facilities to identify and address potential weaknesses in precautionary measures","Technologies":"POE study methodologies, data collection tools, and analysis software","People":"Managers and operators of health club facilities, government health officials","Owner":"Researchers, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Control measures limiting sports activities and services based on COVID-19 risk levels","Impact":"Reduced accessibility to sports facilities and services","Mitigation":"Implementing flexible control measures that can be adjusted based on real-time risk assessments and case numbers","Technologies":"Real-time data tracking, monitoring systems, communication technologies","People":"Facility members, sports facility operators","Owner":"Government health agencies, sports facility management"},{"Description":"Importance of recording operation, protection measures, signages, and briefings for managing pandemic risks","Impact":"Inadequate documentation leading to ineffective pandemic risk management","Mitigation":"Implementing standardized recording and documentation processes, and providing training on proper documentation procedures","Technologies":"Digital documentation tools, training platforms","People":"Sports facility staff, management, government health officials","Owner":"Sports facility management, government health agencies"}]}
